title: Friday Morning ARAMs with RiotGradius!
body:
Hello all!

This is just a simple invite to my Friday morning ARAM games with friends and community. I'll be looking to do mostly in house if we can 

The easiest way to join would be to hang out in my stream at [here](http://www.twitch.tv/riotgradius) but I'll also be inviting from this forum post. So come, hang out, and play some ARAMs!

replies.body: So much fun. Much noms . xoxo
haha, that WAS a lot of fun :) I'm def gonna keep doing this.
I would go but I have work x.x sorry Gradius
I want in tomorrow!! Its my birthday! I'll lync ya too.
Aw you werent there riot girl ;( was expecting you

I thought by morning he meant 10 am. :( Was very sad to miss it. But I hope to level up my acct and unlock all those icons with you guys over this break!! What's yer summoner name (jwf999?) - I'll try to get a game in with you tomorrow!!
He goes from 8-10 and yea my summoner name is jwf999

WOW, everyone so pro. I always lose in ARAM. LoL.
Btw, happy birthday.
That was amazing @_@, I say, MOAR!
Roit really need to fix the server after they upgrade the new patch!!
Riot really need to fix the server after the new patch upgrade!!!!!!!!REALLY　ＮＥＥＤ！！
D'awh I was close :P Just woke up a bit too late. Hope to catch you next time!
Pssst toss me an invite :D In-Game Name: MileHighSaint (Well after I am done patching)
